LanguageData.Alphabeavers.label: alphabeavers
LanguageData.AmbrosiaSprout.label: ambrosia sprout
LanguageData.AmbrosiaSprout.letterText: A grove of the mysterious ambrosia bush has sprouted nearby! If you wait for the plants to grow, you'll be able to harvest the delicious, pleasurable, and slightly addictive fruit.
LanguageData.ColdSnap.label: cold snap
LanguageData.ColdSnap.letterText: An unusual cold snap has set in.\n\nCold snaps can quickly kill by hypothermia. Be sure to build a heated space to survive, wear appropriate apparel, and try to harvest crops before they freeze and die.
LanguageData.CropBlight.label: crop blight
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.label: farm animals wander in
LanguageData.Flashstorm.label: flashstorm
LanguageData.Flashstorm.letterText: A freak localized flashstorm is striking a small area with lightning. This can cause massive fires.
LanguageData.HeatWave.label: heat wave
LanguageData.HeatWave.letterText: An unusual heat wave has begun.\n\nHeat waves can kill quickly if people start getting heatstroke. Stay cool by building a cooler or getting deep under a mountain.
LanguageData.HerdMigration.label: herd migration
LanguageData.HerdMigration.letterText: A group of {0} is passing through the area.\n\nThey won't attack unless provoked.
LanguageData.MeteoriteImpact.label: meteorite impact
LanguageData.MeteoriteImpact.letterText: A large meteorite has struck ground in the area. It has left behind a lump of {0}.
LanguageData.PsychicDrone.label: psychic drone
LanguageData.PsychicSoothe.label: psychic soothe
LanguageData.RansomDemand.label: ransom demand
LanguageData.RefugeeChased.label: chased refugee
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash.label: refugee pod crash
LanguageData.ResourcePodCrash.label: resource pod crash
LanguageData.SelfTame.label: self-tame
LanguageData.ShortCircuit.label: short circuit
LanguageData.ThrumboPasses.label: thrumbos pass
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.label: toxic fallout
LanguageData.ToxicFallout.letterText:
A distant chemical fire has released a plume of poison over this entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will be slowly sickened by the toxic dust settling out of the atmosphere.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a season.
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.label: volcanic winter
LanguageData.VolcanicWinter.letterText: A distant supervolcano has erupted and begun spewing millions of cubic kilometers of ash into the atmosphere.\n\nAsh in the atmosphere will obscure the sun. Temperatures will drop and plants will suffer for lack of sunlight. It could pass in a few weeks, or it might last many quadrums.
LanguageData.WandererJoin.label: wanderer join
LanguageData.WildManWandersIn.label: wild man wanders in
LanguageData.WildManWandersIn.letterText: A person living among wild animals has wandered into the area. [PAWN_pronoun]'s called {0}.\n\nYou can attempt to tame [PAWN_objective].
